item.title: Dollar's Dip After Bessent Appointment is Likely Temporary
item.description: The dollar weakened after Donald Trump nominated hedge-fund manager Scott Bessent as Treasury Secretary, but MUFG said the currency should soon resume...

item.title: Concrete-Maker Quikrete Strikes $9.2 Billion Deal for Summit Materials
item.description: The combination would create a behemoth producer of construction materials in North America.

item.title: Backlash Against Chinese Steel Gives Preview of Trump Trade Tensions
item.description: China is exporting its surplus steel at record levels, but importers are getting fed up.

item.title: What's Flying Higher Than Bitcoin? The Software Company Buying Up Bitcoin
item.description: MicroStrategy shares are a more popular bitcoin play than the cryptocurrency itself for many individual investors.

item.title: Eurozone Bond Yields Trim Declines After German Ifo Data
item.description: Eurozone government bond yields pared losses after the expectations element of the German Ifo sentiment survey came in slightly above forecasts.
